title: Facilitators and barriers to learning faced by female students with disability in higher education
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Hanan M. AlTaleb, Dalal A. Alsaleh, Anwar S. Alshammari, Shatha M. Alsomairy, Shahad M. Alsuaqir, Lama A. Alsaleem, Asma B. Omer, Ruqaiyah Khan, Reem M. Alwhaibi
